text:
e="preserve">David Winters (born David Weizer; 5 April 1939 – 23 April 2019) was a British-American choreographer, actor, movie director and producer. He became well-known for his roles in the 1950s Broadway musicals "West Side Story" and "Gypsy". He also appeared in the "West Side Story" movie. He also worked with Elvis Presley and Ann-Margret as a choreographer in some movies they starred in. He was born in London to a Jewish family.
Winters died on 23 April 2019, at the age of 80.
